tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater
Class UpdaterDialogManager

java.lang.Object
  tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater.UpdaterDialogManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener, UpdateManager.UpdateListener
public class UpdaterDialogManager
extends Object
implements UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener, UpdateManager.UpdateListener

Provides a mechanism for checking updates and displaying notification dialogs to user when needed.
Usage example:

 
 package com.example.app;

 import tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater.Message;
 import tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater.UpdaterDialogManager;
 import android.app.Activity;
 import android.os.Bundle;

 public class SplashActivity extends Activity implements UpdaterDialogManager.UpdaterUiListener {
        private static final String UPDATE_SERVER_URL
                        = "http://example.com/updater-configuration";

        @Override
        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
                super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
                setContentView(R.layout.splah);

                UpdaterDialogManager updaterUI = new UpdaterDialogManager(UPDATE_SERVER_URL);
                updaterUI.startUpdateCheck(this, this);
        }

        @Override
        public void onExitApplication() {
                finish();
        }

        @Override
        public void onUpdateCheckCompleted() {
                // TODO: Add your application initialization step here
        }

        @Override
        public boolean onDisplayMessage(Message message) {
                // TODO: return true if you want to define your own message handling mechanism.
                return false;
        }
 }

Author:
Ugur Ozmen

onUpdateCheckCompleted

public void onUpdateCheckCompleted(UpdateManager manager,
                                   Update update)
Description copied from interface: UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener
This method is called when update check is completed successfully and a newer version is found. Implementations should display Update.description to users. Implementations should not provide an option to cancel and continue to application if Update.forceUpdate is true.

Specified by:
onUpdateCheckCompleted in interface UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener
Parameters:
manager - Update manager that has performed update check.
update - Information about next version found.

onUpdateCheckFailed

                                Exception exception)
Description copied from interface: UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener
This method is called when update check is failed.

Specified by:
onUpdateCheckFailed in interface UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener
Parameters:
manager - Update manager that has performed update check.
exception - Failure reason.

Parameters:
percent - null if current state is interminable otherwise percent of completed progress

onUpdateCancelled

public void onUpdateCancelled()
Description copied from interface: UpdateManager.UpdateListener
Called when update is cancelled. Implementations should close application if Update.forceUpdate is true.

onUpdateCheckCompleted

public void onUpdateCheckCompleted(UpdateManager manager,
                                   Message message)
Description copied from interface: UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener
This method is called when update check is completed successfully and a message should be displayed to user. Implementations should not continue normal operation after this message is dismissed.

Specified by:
onUpdateCheckCompleted in interface UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener
Parameters:
manager - Update manager that has performed update check.
message - Information delivered from server that should be displayed to user.
